name: Swarm of Wharflings
description: The Swarm of Wharflings is a large mass of tiny wharflings that creates chaos by overwhelming foes with swarming attacks and stealing their items.
memorable: The swarm's ability to pilfer items while attacking makes it a unique and disruptive opponent.
goals: To overwhelm enemies, steal items, and create chaos in its environment.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other chaotic creatures or as part of a larger swarm.
environment: Found in chaotic or cluttered environments where they can easily navigate and create disorder.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage, and immune to many conditions, allowing them to remain active in combat.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and an inability to regain hit points limits their sustainability in prolonged encounters.
attacks: Pilfering bites deal significant piercing damage while also potentially stealing items from targets.
most_powerful_ability: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and disrupt their actions while also stealing their equipment.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive Perception of 13, allowing it to be aware of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Sleight of Hand, enhancing its ability to navigate and pilfer effectively.
additional_information: Can breathe air and water, enhancing its versatility.
Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
Makes a strategic nuisance by occupying spaces of larger creatures.
Can cause significant disruption in battle with its unique swarm abilities.
Immune to charm and fear effects, making it challenging to control.

swarm monster that disrupts actions and bites
nimble beast with stealing abilities in combat
large creature that causes chaos and pilfers goods
beast swarm that can breathe in air and water
